Key Match Events: Juan Soto, Gleyber Torres and Giancarlo Stanton drove in runs for the Yankees
Gerrit Cole pitched seven innings, allowing just one run
David Fry hit a two-run home run in the seventh inning for the Guardians
Brayan Rocchio scored from third base on a sacrifice bunt in the top of the ninth
The Tigers clawed back one run in the bottom of the ninth
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge praised Gerrit Cole's performance
The Guardians ended a streak of 11 defeats in playoff elimination games
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Volpe's hard tag on Maikel Garcia led to a bench clearing incident
David Fry's sacrifice bunt in the ninth inning proved crucial
The Yankees will face either the Tigers or the Guardians next
